text: <FO><FO>For the Chief Musician; <FI>set to<Fi> Al-tashheth. <FI>A Psalm<Fi> of David. Michtam; when he fled from Saul, in the cave.<Fo><Fo> Be merciful unto me, O God, be merciful unto me; For my soul taketh refuge in thee: Yea, in the shadow of thy wings will I take refuge, Until <FI>these<Fi>  calamities be overpast.
name: Psalms 57:1
